actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice.

actions.in_subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: To amend title 35, United States Code, with respect to patents on certain processes.

summary.text: Process Patent Amendments of 1990 - Amends Federal patent law to provide for the patentability of certain processes which are sought to be patented in the same application as the machine, manufacture, or composition of matter with which they are associated.

titles.title: To amend title 35, United States Code, with respect to patents on certain processes.
